name: custom-social-connections-digitalpass
description: This application gives Auth0 customers the possibility to manage custom social connections in an easy way.

scripts.clean: npm install clean-css -g && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/public && cleancss -o dist/public/custom-social-connections-1.0.12.min.css src/public/css/styles.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run wt

author: javier.centurion@auth0.com
